title: After Ten Confessions - Novel Updates
author: 殿上不殿下
description:
Qi Yu has a new deskmate.

The teen looks very fierce.

He thought: This fierce, would he be a little softer if he cried?

With a punch, would he cry for a long time?

Luo Shu fell in love at first sight with a particular boy.

He wants to confess to him.

Today.

The boy is Qi Yu.

As far as Qi Yu is concerned – want to bully the bad-boy desk mate into crying pitifully because of a wicked sense of humour, but he wants get into a relationship with me, hesitating…

As far as Luo Shu is concerned – using up his brain juices to confess to the straight-A student and have a sweet relationship, but he only wants to bully me until I cry, feeling depressed…

Gong perspective, school setting, both of age when getting into the relationship.>
